reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater has a nice fit and appreciate its quality, with one noting it looks more expensive than its price.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and beautiful, no regrets!
items.body: This sweater is just gorgeous im 145lbs 5"1 and it fit perfect , the seater has some weight but looks thin. The color is just as shown the khaki color, it's warm and the length is perfect to wear with leggings, I will be purchasing the black one next. The turtle neck is a great size .. I love it and highly recommend this sweater! Read more
items.author: Maria Rosa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars DECENT SWEATER DRESS; 4'11, 165-170
items.body: Im 4'11 at around 165-170 pounds; got a Medium size and it fits nicely besides it being a bit short. I went medium to see if it will show the curves in all the right places while also having the sensual appeal of being at my mid thighs in length. Sweater is heavy and warm, Seams are solid but the skin will be showing if stretched too much. The material isn't scratchy and is definitely comfortable. ONE CON: The turtle neck part is actually disappointing, I'm not sure how it's supposed to be folded but it's not proper. Read more
items.author: Ms246

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and Perfect Fit!
items.body: This sweater is an absolute winner! The quality is fantastic—the material is soft, stretchy, and has a silky smooth feel that’s super comfortable to wear. It’s warm and cozy without being too bulky, making it perfect for fall and winter. The fit is spot on. I’m 5’6” with a bust of 36.5”, and the size small fits like a dream, just as described. The high-low design adds a stylish touch, and the slim fit is super flattering. It pairs beautifully with leggings and knee-high boots for a chic and polished look. I also appreciate that it’s machine washable (with a laundry bag), so it’s easy to care for. This sweater is versatile enough for casual outings, office wear, or even a cozy date night. I’ve already received so many compliments! Highly recommend this sweater for anyone looking for comfort, quality, and style. It’s a staple piece for any wardrobe! Read more
items.author: S Hite

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I have been looking for this sweater!
items.body: After having a few orders go not as expected ( too small, or too thin) I was nervous about this order. I would like to thank all the ladies who posted photos and gave a very honest review about their purchase, it was so helpful. I am loving that you can post photos on the reviews. It makes a huge difference in how I shop on here now. I could not find a nice sweater here in the Las Vegas area. It was getting cold, but the stuff I could find was too flimsy or too thin. After getting a few birthday gift cards I saw this. As I stated before, the ladies that posted photos, this really helped. I ordered the Extra large because I have a larger bust. I am 5 feet tall and I am a size 36D bra. Plus my arms are less than thin or toned at the moment but i am working on that. so i needed the sweater to fit all of this. It arrived as stated: prime in 2 days. I am just now wearing it today for the first time.. It is so soft. Yes, i agree on the texture. Everything is perfect. NO snags, not too thin and not too hot.. On me it comes a few inches above the knee so I can almost wear this as a dress with the appropriate stockings ect. The sleeves are long but not unfashionably long for me and I feel good in it. I am not a turtle neck person so this is nice fitting around my neck, loose but still high enough to get the style. The knit is nice and tight so there are no holes or see through components to this garment that I can tell. I really am enjoying the compliments and comfort of this. I may need to buy all the colors. Read more
items.author: Phoenixmoon3

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color is beautiful
items.body: Love it , fit so good !! I’m 148 lbs 5ft4 got a large Read more
items.author: Jess

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and stretchy
items.body: The colour was just what I was hoping for, and it's soft to the touch. Some sweaters are scratchy, but I was pleased with this material. It looks really nice, fits well, and is a little stretchy. I could have ordered a size down, but this size fits just fine with a little extra room. Feels like an actual sweater, comfortable, and warm. Read more
items.author: Mei

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good, except for one thing
items.body: I have purchased 4 of these sweaters. I love the style and the fit. My only complaint, and it may well be a large one, is that the black sweater I just received did not have any tag on it and smelled strongly of another woman's perfume. I know that people return products, however it smelled like someone wore it all day and had no tag. It's a bit off-putting. So I may not buy another even though I really like the other three. Because it's a bit gross to me that it smelled that way. Like they wore it all day and then returned it. In my opinion, it should not have been resold. I only gave 3 stars because this is a large offense to me. I am 5'4" and 125lbs. I purchased mediums and they fit well. Read more
items.author: K. Spada

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Hunter Green, Wine, Jadeblue, Dark Grey, Black, Camel, Coffee, Softgrass, Orange, Baby Blue, Lake Blue, Plum, Medium Blue, Morandi Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
